channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: AI tool created by JPMorgan analyzes Fed speeches to signal trades
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The investment bank uses OpenAI's ChatGPT to sniff out trading signals from Federal Reserve policy statements.

item.title: CTFC wins record $3.4B penalty payment in Bitcoin-related fraud case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The CFTC said it's the largest fraudulent Bitcoin scheme charged in any of its cases and the "highest civil monetary penalty ordered in a CFTC case."

item.title: Former FTX exec Ryan Salame’s home searched by FBI: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: It’s unclear what the Bureau was searching for in the home of the former co-CEO of FTX Digital Markets, who worked closely with Sam Bankman-Fried.

item.title: SEC's Gary Gensler takes another swipe at crypto in educational video
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The SEC boss reiterated that “the law is clear” on cryptocurrencies being securities, while others highlighted the lack of regulatory clarity in the U.S.

item.title: Coinbase execs respond to SEC’s Wells notice in person and on video
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Coinbase founder Brian Armstrong and chief legal officer Paul Grewal spoke about the company’s Wells notice from the SEC on YouTube and at Consensus 2023.

item.title: China’s wave of ChatGPT rivals, Alibaba goes multichain: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Huawei unveils latest in wave of Chinese ChatGPT rivals, Alibaba’s multichain bridge, Hong Kong crypto exchange regulations imminent.

item.title: 'The war room was despondent' — Scaramucci recounts FTX collapse at Consensus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The SkyBridge founder said that Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao is not to blame for the collapse.

item.title: Robinhood launches fiat-to-crypto on-ramp for self-custody wallets and DApps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Robinhood Markets announced the launch of its new “Robinhood Connect” service and numerous updates to its app.

item.title: US House committees hear similar testimonies in simultaneous hearings on digital assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: A range of speakers addressed issues like agency turf wars and regulator fitness in hearings on regulatory gaps.

item.title: Ether price holds $1,820, but pro traders are skeptical about further gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Ether traders have been neutral-to-bearish for the past week, indicating little confidence in ETH breaking above $2,000.

item.title: Hong Kong authorities remind banks not to be too hasty in rejecting digital asset clients
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Increasing familiarity with virtual asset clients will make Anti-Money Laundering measures easier with time, and the firms should be treated reasonably, the HKMA says.

item.title: Belgian crypto platform Bit4You suspends operations after CoinLoan halts activity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Bit4You suspended operations on April 26 amid a CoinLoan insolvency investigation by Estonian regulators.

item.title: US GDP misses goal as Bitcoin price seeks to erase ‘ultra nasty’ 7% dip
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A brisk slowdown in GDP fails to offer any direction for crypto markets, with Bitcoin slowly clawing back lost ground below $30,000.

item.title: Decentralized file-storage pricing differentials persist despite market growth: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Depending on the metrics, the cost of decentralized file storage can be very low or significantly higher than Web2 counterparts.

item.title: 7 popular tools and frameworks for developing AI applications
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe, Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit, Theano and Apache MXNet are the seven most popular frameworks for developing AI applications.

item.title: 11 industry leaders discuss effective ways to ensure compliant staking
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Staking protocols are subject to evolving and varying regulations, so be prepared to monitor and meet new legal requirements.

item.title: Phantom Wallet CEO explains why wallets must move to be multichain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: Phantom Wallet CEO Brandon Millman argues airdrops may not be worth the hype and self-custody wallets are not off the hook regarding regulation.

item.title: Got liquidated with Bitcoin futures? Get 3.5x leverage using this options strategy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Here is how professional traders use “iron condor” options strategies to benefit from the banking crisis and the U.S. debt ceiling increase.

item.title: California county approves blockchain-based digital wallet for gov't services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Santa Cruz voted to approve the use of a blockchain-based digital wallet for government services and official documentation and is set to begin a pilot program in July 2023.

item.title: Whatever happened to EOS? Community shoots for unlikely comeback
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jillian Godsil
item.description: The EOS community took on the centralized company behind the blockchain — and won. Now comes the fight to get back into the top ten.

item.title: Utah DAO Act: How the law was made and what it means for decentralized business
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: How the Utah DAO Act went from an idea to a piece of legislation — and the challenges along the way.

item.title: Neobank introduces soulbound NFTs for wallet holders’ KYC information
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The small New York-based neobank is seeking to improve crypto users’ experience by melding Web3 features and digital banking.

item.title: Banks bullish on crypto: Standard Chartered’s Zodia raises $36M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: After leading Zodia’s series A funding round, the Japanese financial conglomerate SBI Holdings became its second-largest shareholder.

item.title: What security? Bitcoin enthusiast cracks known 12-word seed phrase in minutes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: If the words of a 12-word seed phrase are known, it’s deceptively easy to enter the wallet and sweep the funds.

item.title: Kraken asks San Francisco court to intervene against IRS demands
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Kraken has joined Coinbase in an effort to push back against the growing regulatory scrutiny by United States regulators.

item.title: Bitget pledges $10M for Fetch.ai ecosystem amid ChatGPT boom
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The move comes amid a surge in popularity for artificial intelligence tools such as ChatGPT.

item.title: Celsius creditors demand transparency on ‘suspicious’ FTX transactions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Celsius creditors say info from FTX is crucial in determining if some CEL trades were meant to inflate its price artificially.

item.title: Google Ads data: $4M stolen through crypto phishing URLs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Unsuspecting cryptocurrency users have lost over $4 million to phishing websites promoted using Google Ads.

item.title: Binance CEO denies $28B wealth: ‘I don’t have anywhere near as much’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: According to Bloomberg's rich list, Binance CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao is supposed to be ranked in the top three finance billionaires worldwide.

item.title: Bitcoin price retargets $29K after Mt. Gox panic liquidates $320M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A now-disproved scare over Mt. Gox's Bitcoin destroys large amounts of BTC open interest and trading positions in hours.
